name: v1.19.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add stardoc by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/336
* Add `_repo_mapping` symlink by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/356
* Move _repo_mapping symlink to runfiles.bzl by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/357

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.18.0...v1.19.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.19.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "7b5cf8123094edbfd585a95ea1b3b5fda17b17c57e8f24617f97303e252e48b2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.19.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.19.0/rules_appimage-1.19.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.18.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix `required` CI check by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/322
* Update pre-commit hook igorshubovych/markdownlint-cli to v0.45.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/320
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/313
* Update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.19.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/314
* Update dependency rules_python to v1.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/316
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.10.2 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/318
* Update pre-commit hook codespell-project/codespell to v2.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/319
* Explicitly use `@rules_shell` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/325
* rm uneeded bzlmod zstd direct dep by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/324
* Update buildifier integration by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/326
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/308
* Bazel 8.3.0 drops @bazel_tools//third_party/zlib by @dws in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/332
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/328
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.10.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/333
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.12.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/330
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.16.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/331
* Update dependency rules_pycross to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/334
* Squashfs 47 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/327
* Use sqfs 4.7 relative hard link mode `h` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/335

## New Contributors
* @dws made their first contribution in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/332

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.17.2...v1.18.0

## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.18.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "8fbcd7ba085ed38f19e21109200d1dcb0bb2c6c3c1750fcb1ec3cb9d616c397f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.18.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.18.0/rules_appimage-1.18.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.17.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Don't call `/usr/bin/dirname` in AppRun by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/296
* Use distroless-cc instead of alpine by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/297
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.11.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/300
* Update dependency rules_python to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/306
* Update dependency rules_pkg to v1.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/305
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/302
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/303
* Update pre-commit hook warchant/pre-commit-buildifier to v0.1.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/304
* Update pre-commit hook warchant/pre-commit-buildifier to v0.1.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/310
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/307
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.9.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/311
* Update dependency rules_testing to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/312
* Fix upstream squashfs-tools hash issue by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/321


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.17.1...v1.17.2


## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.17.2")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark

    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "22e286649d79685b277c0afbbf53879724900b01041bc8997e92846090948be3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.17.2",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.17.2/rules_appimage-1.17.2.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.17.0
body:
## What's Changed

**Features/Bugfixes**:
* Add missing files_to_run manifests to fix cc runfiles library by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/293

**Minor**:
* Use latest Bazel 8 release instead of RC by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/275
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/273
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.9.3 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/267
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.14.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/274
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v39.133.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/269
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-clang-format to v19.1.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/272
* Update rules_pycross to 0.7.1 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/276
* Drop Bazel 6 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/277
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/268
* simplify "required" jobs by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/278
* Update dependency rules_testing to v0.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/259
* Update python3-slim Docker digest to 137ae4b by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/271
* Fix amd64/386 image hash by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/279
* Upgrade humanize test dep by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/280
* Update dependency platforms to v0.0.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/282
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/283
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.9.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/284
* Go back to rules_cc 0.0.17 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/286
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/288
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/289
* Update dependency zstd to v1.5.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/290
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.9.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/291
* Update pre-commit hook rhysd/actionlint to v1.7.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/292


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.16.2...v1.17.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.17.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "e8f3b97346ad4b5aa9dc44cddb7200f9b2cc07cb89661b494f343489dfc57ddc",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.17.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.17.0/rules_appimage-1.17.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.16.2
body:
## What's Changed
* More explicit support for `--nolegacy_external_runfiles` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/248
* Upgrade pre-commit deps, including fixed yamlfix hook by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/249
* Upgrade buildifier by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/250
* Remove unneeded skylib dep by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/251
* Upgrade default to Python 3.13 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/252
* Upgrade with_cfg.bzl by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/262
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/257
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-clang-format to v19.1.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/260
* Update pre-commit hook rhysd/actionlint to v1.7.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/256
* Update pre-commit hook warchant/pre-commit-buildifier to v0.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/261
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/254
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.142.7 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/255
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v39 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/265
* Update pre-commit hook igorshubovych/markdownlint-cli to v0.43.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/264
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/263
* Support testing with Bazel 8 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/266
* Add Bazel 8..0.0rc4 to CI by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/253


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.16.1...v1.16.2

## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.16.2")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "35ff76000cc6757fb92d485d76acc317a696564de557ac88dd0be0404ff18d22",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.16.2",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.16.2/rules_appimage-1.16.2.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.16.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/242
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/244
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/246
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.37.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/243
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/245
* Work around relative symlinks that break when replicated inside runfiles by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/247


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.16.0...v1.16.1

name: v1.16.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/235
* Update pre-commit hook igorshubovych/markdownlint-cli to v0.42.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/236
* Improve detection of relative symlinks inside of bazel cache by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/237
* Improve detection of chained relative symlinks inside of bazel cache by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/238
* Hard-link pseudo files by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/239
* Support custom --sandbox_base by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/240


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.15.2...v1.16.0

name: v1.15.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Use mksquashfs pseudofile definitions for AppImage build by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/228
* Merge steps into a single `AppImage` mnemonic by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/229

Renovate:
* Update dependency rules_oci to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/225
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.80.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/224
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/223
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/226
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.98.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/227


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.14.0...v1.15.0

## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.15.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark

    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "16ca1bd74bf2b8e4dbec80a182e2c8d5f43e5931718d40414476374636342f81",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.15.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.15.0/rules_appimage-1.15.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.14.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Correct `copy_file_or_dir` behavior for dangling symlinks by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/207
* populate_appdir and make_appdir_tar unit tests by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/208
* Reduce default resource_set by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/211
* Convert ManifestData to NamedTuple by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/215
* Extract _prevent_duplicate_dsts_with_diverging_srcs by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/216
* Fix passing -processors and -mem to mksquashfs by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/221
* Prevent bazel from uploading massive .tar/.sqfs files to the remote cache by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/220
* Copy files in threadpool by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/217

### Renovate
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/210
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/209
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.59.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/214
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/213
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/212
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.72.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/219
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/218


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.13.0...v1.14.0

## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.14.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "52658dc8695748a20d91f5ec46a827d663671f1a52c3fa595de8edc119fb8d3b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.14.0/rules_appimage-1.14.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

name: v1.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
Minor:
* Add release process notes by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/196
* Limit Renovate to weekly schedule by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/201
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.5.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/200
* Update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.11.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/199
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/198
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.19.2 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/197
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/204
* Update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/202
* Update pre-commit hook renovatebot/pre-commit-hooks to v38.39.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/203

**Implementation changes:**
* Split `AppImage` mnemonic into `MkAppDir`, `Sqfstar`, `AppImage` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/206
   Please note that this removes the `build_env` attr.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.12.1...v1.13.0

## `MODULE.bazel` setup

```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.13.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup

```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "8f229fb943cfe4b0b1350b2722aeec65fcb01b2da6f0903246f793fd6fb3eca1",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.13.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.13.0/rules_appimage-1.13.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")

## What's Changed
* Fix BCR presubmit file to not run rules_pycross tests on macos by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/182
* Update dependency rules_pycross to v0.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/181
* Add rules_testing by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/184
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/186
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/185
* Update dependency rules_pycross to v0.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/189
* Update dependency platforms to v0.0.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/153
* Update dependency with_cfg.bzl to v0.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/190
* Update dependency container_structure_test to v1.19.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/191
* Fix Python 3.9 compatibility by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/193 (thx @nicktanqy)
* Update dependency rules_oci to v1.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/188
* Update dependency rules_pkg to v1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/187
* Switch from trunk to pre-commit by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/194
* Update readme by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/195


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.12.0...v1.12.1


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark

```

    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "c320857278bcb37ca21ad90e48b1289e58947ffac4976aab247d4e3b4c86509a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.12.1",

name: v1.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
Renovate PRs:
* Update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/172
* Update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/177
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.33.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/178
* Upgrade Trunk linter plugins by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/176
* Upgrade Trunk and linters by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/180

Updated/new/removed features:
* Remove icon support by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/174
* Clean up args passed to mkappimage by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/175
* Ensure compatibility with rules_pycross TreeArtifacts by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/173
* Deduplicate files with the same destination by @woutervdstoel in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/179


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.11.0...v1.12.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.12.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "b3500b1691d8f831bb2403e51dfd7e78009e06d4bae4eaba3ef127c518de051e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.12.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.12.0/rules_appimage-1.12.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
Feature fixes:
* Improve `is_inside_bazel_cache()` with output_base detection heuristics. by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/155 (thanks @chestnutprog)
* Set `BUILD_WORKING_DIRECTORY` even when `APPIMAGE_EXTRACT_AND_RUN=1` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/157

CI maintenance and dependency updates:
* Update Python deps by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/149
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.31.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/127
* Update dependency zstd to v1.5.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/154
* Drop support for Bazel 5 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/144
  Note: there shouldn't be any Bazel 5-breaking changes (yet?), but CI support was becoming too difficult

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.9.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark

    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "6a960c2c0acc5a55d2414fbf09afa89ce7468f5d1a63a8c3d8abaead1cc5a5d7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.9.0/rules_appimage-1.9.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
Feature changes:
* Change symlink following behavior by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/118

BCR maintenance changes:
* Move the `-std=c++20` option to the BUILD target by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/145
* Reinstate `bcr_test_module` root key in presubmit.yml by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/146
* Chance BCR source url template to release download url by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/147
* Make skylib a non-dev dep by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/148


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.7.5...v1.8.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.8.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "16cb94cb0305564d47d965cc5dadb12fb95aa00b2936e52c1c3b4e21975bba47",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.8.0/rules_appimage-1.8.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

This is a maintenance release without any feature changes.

## What's Changed
* Add bazel test matrix for BCR presubmit tests by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/132
* Fix macOS CI caching by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/133
* Massage bzlmod ci matrix by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/135
* simplify BCR presubmit by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/137
* Move some deps to bzlmod by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/136
* Add BuildBuddy BES and Remote Caching by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/138
* Add fallback readonly buildbuddy key by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/139
* Use BCR squashfs when using Bzmlod by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/141
* Stop VS Code / pyright from spinning out of control by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/142


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.7.4...v1.7.5


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.7.5")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "92fcb1f733bcd9b8a1b8c829123fcd0cf7257b08b39a42e1dc82b16edf7ee048",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.7.5",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.7.5/rules_appimage-1.7.5.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

## What's Changed
**Bzlmod and BCR setup**
* Add publish-to-bcr templates by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/106
* support root modules using python 3.8 by @shabanzd in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/115
* Simplify CI bzlmod matrix setup by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/124
* Add example by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/108
* Prepare release by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/128
* Add maintainer with email by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/129
* Add GitHub username by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/130
* Add back in module version by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/131

**General fixes/improvements**
* Suport root_symlinks by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/116
* Downgrade WORKSPACE rules_python to make Bazel 5 CI green by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/126

**Version upgrades**
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/121
* Update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/122
* Upgrade py requirements by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/125


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.4


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.7.4")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "d38be277ca88ba4897d1e92faa24ab147ce0df41daa6d5a2d9c66c48aa54722a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.7.4",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.7.4/rules_appimage-1.7.4.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.6.0
body:
## What's Changed

* remove unneeded `bazel_dep`s by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/107
* Add `-pthread` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/110
* Add `-lpthread` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/111
* Support dangling symlinks created with `ctx.actions.declare_symlink` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/112
* Remove absolute symlink tests by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/113
* bump version to 1.6.0 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/114


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.6.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "130b725b4deb58e36e792f23bbaaa1ccfb237eaa1ee7402d14172ff13b562586",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.6.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.4.0
body:
## What's Changed

### New and exciting
* Bazel 5/6/7 compatibility by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/100 (but no bzlmod support yet :crying_cat_face: )

### Docs
* Remove verbatim WORKSPACE instrcuctions from README.md by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/87
* Fix WORKSPACE setup by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/89

### Minor changes
* Silence compiler issues by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/90
* Mute `-Wunused-but-set-variable` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/91
* Mute ALL squashfs warnings by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/96

### CI
* Remove Python test matrix by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/97
* Dont complain about py requirements sandboxing by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/98
* Don't run on all pushes, only on PRs and after landing on main by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/99

### Full Changelog
https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "61afde839bb60bf8c502741f4db920085ad5cb9d8d64ed81db3fd41c84b1af9d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.4.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.3.0
body:
## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "041326e84995c64c2702bcb37d958e2a94dee8e4385eb2b309e4af82406f6aed",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.3.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

## What's Changed

### New features
* Support cross-platform and cross-architecture builds using toolchains by @lgarbarini in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/72

### Internal changes
* Switch to Bazel-built mksquashfs by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/73
* use bazel-runfiles instead of accessing runfiles from rules_python by @shabanzd in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/86

### Linting and docs
* Use Trunk check by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/75
* Add some more details on appimages and two alternatives by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/82

### Renovate
* Update py deps by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/83
* Upgrade py (dev) requirements by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/76
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/77
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/80
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/81
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/84

## New Contributors
* @lgarbarini made their first contribution in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/72
* @shabanzd made their first contribution in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/86

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

Interesting changes from the last version include:
 * New `data` attribute on the `appimage` rule itself: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/68


`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "d59605787b22f0a3a122b8d26333973a2098c58c13119ac26ecf7183be6c0aa4",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.2.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```

Interesting changes from the last version include:
* Add Mend renovate and use it to update some dependencies
* set the `BUILD_WORKING_DIRECTORY` env var which helps with building CLIs that accept relative file paths (https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/58)
* Explicitly re-set the `RUNFILES_DIR` env var to the runfiles of the binary target, not of the appimage rule itself. This fixes the `runfiles.bash` setup handling. `https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/58)
* The variables set in the appimage target's `env` attr are now available also when running the appimage without `bazel run` by re-exporting them in the AppRun entrypoint https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/59
* The `env` attr dict of the binary target is preserved and updated with the appimage target's `env` attr dict when possible. Note that all not all rulesets and versions of Bazel support this. For example, rules_python does not work yet, and rules_cc works with Bazel >= 6. https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/59

`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "f4be008c95adfd3c610ba9c12cc38b58eda3ea62d4ef6bf25f9fb3d746fd6b34",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.1.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```

name: v1.0.1
body:
Interesting changes from the last version include:
* rules_python is not a "runtime" dependency anymore. It's removed from the `rules_appimage_deps()` function
* Using `maybe` rules for http_archives
* CI changes

The `appimage` and `appimage_test` rules have not changed since the last release.

`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "eb3065a2e0f26b01c85020baa73528f6d2f6fdcbfeb12d2d486cb388fc449597",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.0.1",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.0.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```
This has been stable for a while, so why not claim this is v1.0.0 :)
